英文法規名稱: Organization Act of the Institute of Diplomacy and International Affairs, Ministry of Foreign Affairs
中文法規名稱: 外交部外交及國際事務學院組織法
沿革內容: 1.Promulgated by Presidential Order Hua Zong 1 Yi Zi No. 10000252461 on November 14, 2011

法規內容.條文內容: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs shall establish the Institute of Diplomacy and International Affairs (hereinafter referred to as “the Institute”), which shall administer training for diplomatic and consular personnel and other related specialists, research on foreign policies, and international exchanges.
A Deputy Minister or Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs shall concurrently serve as the Institute’s Chancellor; the Institute shall have one President at senior grades 12-13.
The Institute shall have one Chief-Secretary at senior grade 11.
The ranks, grades and number of positions of Institute staff shall be governed by a separate organization chart.
The date that this Act enters into effect shall be gazetted by the Executive Yuan.
